title: Noxus Poppy Skin gives Error "INVALID SKIN"
body: Bought Noxus Poppy skin. Played one game with it. went to reselect it for second game. Error occurred.

replies.body:
Hiya Allister Kain! 

Happy Snowdown! Were you experiencing this issue in Team Builder?
Uh oh, I hope I don't get this cause I own that one.
